document_data.mainbody:
elann Brandish was a cleric of Chauntea at the Bounty of the Goddess temple in Archendale in the late 14 century DR.
Melann had long dark hair, tied away from her face. She wore a leather jerkin and a brown cloak for protection while traveling. She was never found without her wooden holy symbol to Chauntea around her neck on an amulet.
Melann had a single sibling, her brother Whitlock Brandish.
Circa , Melann and her brother went on a quest to try and lift a deadly curse that was cast on their family by Chareen.
